title: Popular Tibetan singer Tsewang Norbu dies of self-immolation protest
description: The Tibetan Centre for Human Rights and Democracy (TCHRD) has been informed by credible sources that Tsewang Norbu, 25, a famous Tibetan singer died of self-immolation on 25 February this year protesting the Chinese governmentâ€™s repression at the Potala Palace Square in Lhasa, Tibet Autonomous Regio
